question:

H(z) = 6 + z-1 - z-2

Minimum phase

6z2 + z - 1 = 0

∴ We have zeros at z = 1/3 and z = - 1/2

∴ All the zeroes lies inside the unit circle, it is a min. phase system.

explanation:

Thus net voltage = -0.7 V .

question: Find the value of ix if each resistance is of 3 Ω and each battery is of 6 V.
explanation:
Using Mesh analysis

Loop 1 : 6 = 9i1 - 3i4 ...(i)

Loop 2: 6 + 6 = - 6i2

i2 = - 2A ...(ii)

Loop 3: 6 = 9i3 - 3i4 ...(iii)

Loop 4: 6 = 9i4 - 3i3 - 3i1 ...(iv)

Solving the above equations simultaneously

i1 = i3 = 1.1428 A

i4 = 1.432 A

∴ ix = i4 - i3 = 0.2892 A.

question: An image uses 512 x 512 picture elements. Each of the picture elements can take any of the 8 distinguishable intensity levels. The maximum entropy in the above image will be
explanation:
Picture elements (pixel) = 512 x 512 = 262144

Information per picture element N = log2 M

M = 2N

8 = 2N

N = 3

Information for 262144 pixels = 262144 x 3 = 786432 bits

Entropy is same as average information per message.
